text: The Money Bomb is a bookhttp://www.ossianbooks.co.uk/show.php?item=MONB by financial author James Gibb Stuart, outlining a system of reform for the British pound that was advocated by the Margaret Thatcher administration. Stuart claims it faced controversy when book stores and periodicals were threatened with blacklisting if they carried or covered the book.http://www.prosperityuk.com/prosperity/views/jgs_Int.html ==Notes== Category:Monetary reform Category:1983 non-fiction books
